## Installation

You can install the development version of jakR2 from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jeffkimbrel/jakR2")
```

# Package index

## Genomics

- [`read_orthogroups()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/read_orthogroups.md)
  : Import an orthofinder TSV file
- [`orthogroup_list2counts()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/orthogroup_list2counts.md)
  : Convert an orthogroup list dataframe to a count dataframe

## Diversity

- [`get_alpha_diversity()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_alpha_diversity.md)
  : Alpha-Diversity Measures
- [`get_alpha_S()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_alpha_S.md)
  : Calculate richness (S) and sample depth
- [`get_alpha_simpson()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_alpha_simpson.md)
  : Calculate Simpson's diversity index and its evenness and inverse
- [`get_alpha_shannon()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_alpha_shannon.md)
  : Calculate Shannon's diversity index and its evenness and effective
  number of species (ENS)

## Phlyogenetics

- [`get_tip_index()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_tip_index.md)
  : Get the index of a tip in a tree
- [`get_tip_edges()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_tip_edges.md)
  : Get the edges that lead to a tip

## Markdown

- [`file2gfm()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/file2gfm.md)
  : Decorate a file string for gfm markdown in Obsidian
- [`obs2gfm()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/obs2gfm.md)
  : Decorate an Obsidian link for gfm markdown

## Themes and Colors

- [`jak_theme()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/jak_theme.md)
  : JAK ggplot theme
- [`palette_jak()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/palette_jak.md)
  : A full-service color palette creator
- [`blend_palette()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/blend_palette.md)
  : Blend palette with a color
- [`scale_color_jak_d()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/scale_color_jak_d.md)
  : Custom discrete ggplot2 scale color
- [`scale_fill_jak_d()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/scale_fill_jak_d.md)
  : Custom discrete ggplot2 scale fill
- [`get_color_palette()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_color_palette.md)
  : Return table of colors for a palette
- [`show_color_palette()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/show_color_palette.md)
  : showColorPalette
- [`show_all_color_palettes()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/show_all_color_palettes.md)
  : Show all color palettes in the jak_palettes object
- [`get_luminance()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_luminance.md)
  : Title
- [`get_text_color()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_text_color.md)
  : Title

## Amplicons and ASVs

- [`seqtab_stats()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/seqtab_stats.md)
  : Extract DADA2 seqtab statistics
- [`seqtab_to_ft()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/seqtab_to_ft.md)
  : Make ft object from DADA2 seqtab
- [`ft()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/ft.md) :
  Feature table class
- [`get_asv_table`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_asv_table.md)
  : Return ASV table from ft object
- [`get_sequences`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_sequences.md)
  : Return DNAstring object from ft object
- [`filter_asv_table`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/filter_asv_table.md)
  : Filter an ft object by minimum count and sample
- [`cluster_asv_table`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/cluster_asv_table.md)
  : Cluster ASV sequences from ft object
- [`seqtab_stats_bind()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/seqtab_stats_bind.md)
  : Stats of multiple seqtab objects
- [`seqtab_stats_plot()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/seqtab_stats_plot.md)
  : Plot multiple seqtab objects

## CARD

- [`card_parse()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/card_parse.md)
  : Parse CARD database JSON file
- [`card_ab_info()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/card_ab_info.md)
  : Get information about an antibiotic
- [`card_gene_info()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/card_gene_info.md)
  : Get antibiotic information about a gene
- [`card_gene2ab()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/card_gene2ab.md)
  : Get gene information about an antibiotic
- [`card_ab2gene()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/card_ab2gene.md)
  : Get gene information about an antibiotic

## fastq

- [`fastq_info_summary()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/fastq_info_summary.md)
  : Summarize a fastq_info file
- [`fastq_filter_summary_amplicon()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/fastq_filter_summary_amplicon.md)
  : Summarize a fastq_filter.py file in amplicon mode
- [`fastq_filter_summary_meta()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/fastq_filter_summary_meta.md)
  : Summarize a fastq_filter.py file in metagenome mode

## Utilities

- [`get_package_info()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_package_info.md)
  : Package info utility
- [`get_session_info()`](https://jeffkimbrel.github.io/jakR2/reference/get_session_info.md)
  : Session info utility
